modName: Main Menu Replacer - Skyrim and Kingdom Hearts Music add
summary: its an update from the work uploaded for Vinchon, i'm just add the music
descriptionHtml:
original work http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76304 im just add the music (sorry for my english), is this theme that i used https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_SzmiNH8pnU, but im using the one from the album kingdom hearts piano collections "Dearly Beloved" theme piano version, this goes great whit the mod Kingdom Hearts UI Sounds http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/85747, enjoy

added new version whit orchestral theme
author: original autor Vinchon
